alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 2:48AM MST until January 21 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and west central Kansas. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of one to two inches per hour will lead to visibility of a quarter mile or less at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
